[1]:

from streng.codes.greek.kanepe.assessment.section_properties.rectangular import RectangularKanepe
from streng.ppp.sections.concrete.typical_sections.rectangular_rc import SectionMaterials
from streng.ppp.sections.concrete.typical_sections.rectangular_rc import RectangularConcreteSection
from streng.ppp.sections.concrete.reinforcement.rectangular_reinforcement import RectangularSectionReinforcement
from streng.ppp.sections.concrete.reinforcement.combos import LongReinforcementLayer, TransReinforcementLayer
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

ΚΑΠΕΠΕ - Ορθογωνική δοκός¶

[2]:

rect = RectangularKanepe(
    rcs=RectangularConcreteSection(
        b=0.25,
        h=0.60,
        materials=SectionMaterials(fc=16.e3,
                                Ec=25.3e6,
                                fy=500.e3,
                                Es=200e6,
                                fyw=500.e3),
        reinforcement=RectangularSectionReinforcement(long1=LongReinforcementLayer.from_string(reinf_string= '5Φ18', units_input='mm', units_output='m'),
                                                   long2=LongReinforcementLayer.from_string(reinf_string= '3Φ18', units_input='mm', units_output='m'),
                                                   longV=LongReinforcementLayer.from_string(reinf_string= '0Φ0'),
                                                   disdia=LongReinforcementLayer.from_string(reinf_string= '0Φ0'),
                                                   trans=TransReinforcementLayer.from_string(reinf_string= 'Φ8/200(2)', units_input='mm', units_output='m'),
                                                   cnom = 0.03)),
     Ls=2.525,
     N=0.)

rect.print_output_tables()

materials

|:-----------|----------:|
| fc         | 1.600E+04 |
| Ec         | 2.530E+07 |
| fy         | 5.000E+05 |
| fyw        | 5.000E+05 |
| Es         | 2.000E+08 |
